<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), date_joined TIMESTAMP)</t><s>INSERT INTO users (id, username, email, date_joined) VALUES (1, 'JohnDoe', 'johndoe@example.com', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET username=EXCLUDED.username, email=EXCLUDED.email, date_joined=EXCLUDED.date_joined</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, post_content TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id))</t><s>UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '2022-10-15') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com', created_at='2022-10-15';</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);</t><s>INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '2022-10-20 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', created_at = '2022-10-20 12:00:00';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, created_at) values (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '2022-10-20 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', created_at = '2022-10-20 12:00:00';</s>

    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)

    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);</t><s>INSERT INTO posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'This is a sample post', '2022-10-20 12:30:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1, post_content = 'This is a sample post', created_at = '2022-10-20 12:30:00';</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    like_date DATE
);</t><s>INSERT INTO users(user_id, username, email, date_joined) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, date_joined = excluded.date_joined;</s>

    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE

<t>CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    like_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE
);</t><s>INSERT INTO users(user_id, username, email, date_joined) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, date_joined = excluded.date_joined;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    like_date DATE
);</t><s>INSERT INTO posts(post_id, user_id, post_content, post_date) VALUES (1, 1, 'Example post content', '2022-01-05') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, post_date = excluded.post_date;</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    like_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into posts(post_id, user_id, post_content, post_date) values (1, 1, 'example post content', '2022-01-05') on conflict (post_id) do update set user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, post_date = excluded.post_date;</s>

    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);</t><s>INSERT INTO posts(post_id, user_id, post_content, post_date) VALUES (1, 1, 'Example post content', '2022-01-05') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, post_date = excluded.post_date;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    like_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into posts(post_id, user_id, post_content, post_date) values (1, 1, 'example post content', '2022-01-05') on conflict (post_id) do update set user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, post_date = excluded.post_date;</s>

    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into comments(comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_text, comment_date) values (1, 1, 1, 'example comment text', '2022-01-10') on conflict (comment_id) do update set post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_text = excluded.comment_text, comment_date = excluded.comment_date;</s>

    date_joined DATE
);

    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into comments(comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_text, comment_date) values (1, 1, 1, 'example comment text', '2022-01-10') on conflict (comment_id) do update set post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_text = excluded.comment_text, comment_date = excluded.comment_date;</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) values (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'hello, i am john doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) values (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'hello, i am john doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) values (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'hello, i am john doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) values (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'hello, i am john doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) values (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'hello, i am john doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) VALUES (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'Hello, I am John Doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, bio, created_at) values (1, 'john.doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'hello, i am john doe', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = excluded.username, email = excluded.email, bio = excluded.bio, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'A great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) values (1, 1, 'a great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') on conflict (post_id) do update set user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'A great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'A great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) values (1, 1, 'a great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') on conflict (post_id) do update set user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'A great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'A great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Posts (post_id, user_id, post_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'A great post!', '2022-01-01 12:10:00') ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = excluded.user_id, post_content = excluded.post_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') ON CONFLICT (comment_id) DO UPDATE SET post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) values (1, 1, 1, 'nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') on conflict (comment_id) do update set post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') ON CONFLICT (comment_id) DO UPDATE SET post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) values (1, 1, 1, 'nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') on conflict (comment_id) do update set post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') ON CONFLICT (comment_id) DO UPDATE SET post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>INSERT INTO Comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') ON CONFLICT (comment_id) DO UPDATE SET post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) values (1, 1, 1, 'nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') on conflict (comment_id) do update set post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)</t><s>INSERT INTO Comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') ON CONFLICT (comment_id) DO UPDATE SET post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, bio TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, comment_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)</t><s>insert into comments (comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_content, created_at) values (1, 1, 1, 'nice post!', '2022-01-01 12:15:00') on conflict (comment_id) do update set post_id = excluded.post_id, user_id = excluded.user_id, comment_content = excluded.comment_content, created_at = excluded.created_at</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, follower_user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (follower_user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, post_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)
